page.title: 05PUPIL INTERVIEW-12yrs
page.content: We talked to a first year pupil from Marden High School.His day starts at 7:30am,when he gets up,gets ready etc.He walks to school in 15 minutes and reaches it for 8:45am.He then has an assembly,and his lessons start at 8:55.He works until 12pm.His lunch break finishes at 1:15pm,and then he works until 3:45pm,then he walks home,and goes to bed later on at 10:30 pm.Some of the lessons that he gets are athletics,science,English,Maths, Humanities,Art,Woodwork,Discussion and French.All these lessons last 35 mins. His average non-school day is,he wakes up at about 12pm,then has breakfast.Then he rings up a friend and arranges for them to go somewhere.After that he has dinner,and plays outside for the rest of the day.He is home for his tea and is in bed for 10:30pm. His main interests are girls,ice
